reporter_caption.center: MOTOR CAR FINANCE COMPANY v. MASDEN, 292 Ky. 852 (1942)

caption.center: MOTOR CAR FINANCE COMPANY, Movant, v. Minnie MASDEN, Opposed.

opinion.posture: Motion for an appeal from the Jefferson Circuit Court, Common Pleas Branch, Fourth Division. Judgment dismissing plaintiff's (Movant) petition seeking recovery on note executed under terms of Small Loan Act, Ky. Stats., sec. 8831-1 et seq.
opinion.attorneys:
Wade Mapother for movant.
Lee S. Jones, opposed.
